column3: Latest;Kandal: An explosion from the ground blew up a man driving a tractor
column4: seriously injuring him.------The explosion happened at 8:05 am on May 30
column5: 2019 in the village of Chamkar Mon Jork commune
column7: Kandal province.------Police in Ang Snuol district said that the victim
column9: was plowing a field for an elderly woman named Sam Ol.------Shortly afterwards
column10: the victim was taken to a Phnom Penh Hospital.------It is not clear what kind of munition caused the explosion
column11: but reports say it could have been a landmine or old rocket from the war. ------https://kbn.news/archives/124355
